column1: # LOGIC: Prices derived from CAPMAS domestic data and export trends. Farmgate = ~55-65% of wholesale; Retail = ~160-180% of wholesale. Cucumber is greenhouse/field crop with year-round production.
# DEPENDENCIES: USD/EGP exchange rates from World Bank; CAPMAS monthly data (2019-2023) via Statista
# ASSUMPTIONS: Domestic prices ~10.84 EGP/kg (May 2023 CAPMAS). Export prices $1.03-1.18/kg (2019-2021) significantly higher than domestic. Year-round production with summer peak supply.
# DATA_QUALITY: High. CAPMAS official data (2019-2023) provides reliable domestic EGP prices. Export data from SelinaWamucii verified. Tridge confirms recent wholesale ranges.
# COMPARISON_TO_TOY: Research prices comparable to toy in wholesale range. Toy range $0.84-$1.42/kg; research range $0.55-$0.90/kg wholesale for domestic. Export prices ($1.03-1.25) reflect premium.

column8: CAPMAS May 2023: 10.84 EGP/kg domestic; major devaluation
